{{disambig-two: He inherited the crown early when his father [[Rómendacil I]] was killed during an [[Easterlings
the [[Kings of Gondor: Easterling]] invasion of northern [[Ithilien]].  Turambar sought vengeance for his father's death, and succeeded brilliantly. {{disambig-two: Because Turambar was young when he took the throne his rule lasted longer than a century. His was the longest reign of Gondor since that of his ancestor [[Meneldil]]. He was succeeded by his son [[Atanatar I]].
